solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--        public int[] nextGreaterElements(int[] nums) {--newline--            int n = nums.length, next[] = new int[n];--newline--            Arrays.fill(next, -1);--newline--            Stack<Integer> stack = new Stack<>(); // index stack--newline--            for (int i = 0; i < n * 2; i++) {--newline--                int num = nums[i % n]; --newline--                while (!stack.isEmpty() && nums[stack.peek()] < num)--newline--                    next[stack.pop()] = num;--newline--                if (i < n) stack.push(i);--newline--            }   --newline--            return next;--newline--        }--newline--    --newline--}
